actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Bite [Melee Attack]: 2 (d4) and Sickened (Cd4, Unconscious and +1 Fatigue each Round). If failed by 5 or more, it is also Restrained (5 (2d4) each Round) Restoration [Cast, Touch]: Regain 10 (3d6) HP Shapechange [Cast, Self] (Focus): Polymorphs into a Medium or smaller Being. It uses its own Statblock.
